statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: XY is playing a game:there are N pillar in a row,which numbered from 1 to n.Each pillar has a jewel.Now XY is standing on the S-th pillar and the exit is in the T-th pillar.XY can leave from the exit only after they get all the jewels.Each time XY can move to adjacent pillar,or he can jump to boundary ( the first pillar or the N-th pillar) by using his superpower.However,he needs to follow a rule:if he left the pillar,he no can not get here anymore.In order to save his power,XY wants to use the minimum number of superpower to pass the game.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases, no more than 1000 cases.
For each case,the line contains three integers:N,S and T.$(1\leq N\leq10000,1\leq S,T\leq N )$

statement.title: Output
statement.content: The output of each case will be a single integer on a line: the minimum number of using superpower or output -1 if he can't leave.
